title: Game Character Dwarf Sound Effects
description: Grab your boom boom stick – An infamous subterranean fantasy character emerges.. The Game Character “Dwarf” shows off rich dwarven voice over sayings, dialogue, vocalizations and more.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Includes over 470+ scripted custom lines, battle cries, fight vocals, and everything you need to build a compelling war mongering, drunken beard wearing, protagonist dwarf character in your next game!

Dive in, and create interactive dialogue between characters and fantasy filled in-game audio experiences for your audience. Inspired by hit games like Starcraft and World of Warcraft, Game Character Undead ensures you have thought provoking dialogue to incite and inspire and a big game title sound.

Presented in Format: , 44.1k 16Bit. You instantly get to have easy access to whichever format best suits your project. Game Character Dwarf – the bank of epic fantasy humanoid vocals, dialogue and immersive game audio in your next epic fantasy adventure production.
technicalDetails:
• 476 dwarf dialogue audio files
  • 539.6 MB of vocal samples
  • Includes Format: 44.1k 16Bit
  • Game Character Voice Over Sound Effects Library
  • 18 battle cries and sayings
  • 3 breathing paces – fast, slow, winded
  • 17 hacking coughs, light, quick, and wheezy
  • 13 crying vocalizations like balling, long, short, quick and sad sayings
  • 160 interactive scripted dialogue files like face the storm of my vengeance and a dwarf never forgets
  • 28 fighting vocals like groan, grunt, and swing
  • 32 jumping vocals long, double jump, long, heavy and light
  • 18 laughs, chuckles, hearty and explosive
  • 24 pain vocals like groan, death, wounded and sayings
  • 163 dialogue lines like affirmative, attack, I need reinforcements, no and please
  • & and so much more!

Number of Audio Waves: 474

Number of Audio Cues: 475

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 30+m

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,

Documentation: Content List
